full_sentence: Some people want what they can't have, why? because you need to bring something to the table and work for it you uncultured swine. Same with their emotions, It's obvious we see what's wrong with you, chip on the shoulder, angry, jealous petty simpleton emotions your thirst, and self-hatred is cancerous. No human should be forced to deal with that. Entitled culture will never be a viable or acceptable way to act amongst most people, no one ever says you know what would make this party better, more complaining!

anger, jealous petty simpleton emotions your thirst, and self-hatred is cancerous

full_sentence: Abolish politics! All the MPs are just a bunch of asses consuming all our public money!
Just answer my question!! Are you a bitch? Ok, then stop using that gesture as its insulting!
